tooltip: Select Telara, Headmaster Historian, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Telara focuses on better technology and information gathering.
Allows you to summon Telara, a Melee hero with a stun attack.
Advancing Phases is 10% cheaper and 10% faster.
Spawns additional Infiltrators at start of a match.
Infiltrators can be upgraded with Bladed Fins, turning them into Melee combat units.
